function ERU_EP04_19()
    -- .転-3【12月第1週】「ｖｓ本気のダリア」
    SaveData.Title = "ｖｓ本気のダリア"

    -- //BG：姫神邸廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013be")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,600,500)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Strength wells up in my body, which was drained of energy. ]])

    MSG([[ I push my body up with my arms and force myself to stand on trembling legs. ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(LAYER_BG,600,480,300,Ease.Linear)
    WAIT(300)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(LAYER_BG,600,0,800,Ease.OutBounce)
    WAIT(800)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2274.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "Aaaaaaahhhhhhh…!!!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav")

    -- //BU：ダリア（驚き）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG013ba")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ Startled by the shout that escaped me, Daria-san, who was about to leave, turned around. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2275.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "Where do you think you’re going, Daria-san? The match isn’t over yet." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0663.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Surprised
 "I’m surprised... You’re still conscious." ]])

    MSG([[ With an exasperated look, Daria-san let out a deep sigh and gave me a provocative glare. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0664.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "But I’ve already taken two rounds. In a best-of-three, that means I’m the victor, don’t you think?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2276.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Unfortunately... this is a real fight. If you want to stop me, you’ll have to shoot me with a tranquilizer or tie me up with ropes." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0665.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Smiling
 "Hey now, there’s no need for that, right?" ]])

    MSG([[ Daria-san cracked her knuckles, wore a cold smile, and prepared herself again. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0666.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "I won’t go easy on you just because you’re a junior. I’ll break your spirit with all my might so you never want to stand up again." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0667.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "...The next one will truly be the last." ]])

    MSG([[ A murderous intent prickled my skin. This wasn’t a threat; she was seriously intending to finish it next time. ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --吉　イベントCGができたら調整
    -- //CG：ステージ上のエリカ（対・ダリア・背景差分）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVd001aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BU_DAR01bb")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0668.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "No matter how many times we repeat this, the result won’t change." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2277.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Yes, until just a moment ago, I definitely couldn’t have beaten you." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2278.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "But after being knocked down twice, I finally understood the characteristics of the martial art you use." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0669.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "...What?" ]])

    MSG([[ Daria-san doesn’t overpower me with strength. What she’s good at is predicting my next move. ]])

    MSG([[ By anticipating my movements, she restrains my techniques and uses my power against me. ]])

    MSG([[ But there was one attack she couldn’t read and took full on: the reckless kick I threw in mid-air earlier. ]])

    MSG([[ There’s always a clue to strategy there. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2279.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (Could it be that Daria-san can’t read the movements of my “feet”...?) ]])

    MSG([[ A barely perceptible hope. Still, right now I had no choice but to cling to it. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0670.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Thinking so carefully in front of the enemy—that’s some guts." ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //CG：ステージ上のエリカ（対・ダリア・ダリア接近）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVd001aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BUL_DAR01ab")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ No sooner said than done, Daria-san closed the distance and raised her fist. ]])

    MSG([[ This technique—I saw it at Akira’s house— ]])

    -- //以降、選択肢をとにかく手当り次第に選ぶ形で、エリカのガムシャラさを表現したいです。

    -- //特殊選択肢⇒姫摘み

    local result = HimeSenkyo(SenkyoData.EP04_2_ERU,"前回ボクが敗れた技の名前は？")

    if result == false then
        NazenanoBokuhime("EP_BAD_12", "ERU_EP04_19")
        return
    end

    -- //突きを放つ音
PLAY_SE("SEc012.wav")
WAIT(300)

    MSG([[ Daria-san’s strike barely missed. ]])

    MSG([[ Still terrifyingly fast. You can’t dodge after it’s thrown. ]])

    MSG([[ But for some reason, this didn’t have the sharpness I felt when she landed the technique before. ]])

    MSG([[ —Am I supposed to be able to properly catch that strike? How? ]])

    MSG([[ No time to think. Without pause, Daria-san’s right leg swung hard. ]])

    -- //特殊選択肢 ⇒ 蹴り

    local result = HimeSenkyo(SenkyoData.EP04_3_ERU,"右足を振りかぶったダリアさんの次の技は？")

    if result == false then
        NazenanoBokuhime("EP_BAD_12", "ERU_EP04_19")
        return
    end

    -- //SE：蹴りの音
PLAY_SE("SEc017.wav")
WAIT(300)

    MSG([[ A sharp, scythe-like kick grazed my throat. ]])

    MSG([[ Just in the nick of time. This is a razor-thin exchange where a single mistake means getting hit. ]])

    MSG([[ Then Daria-san blatantly raised her left fist— ]])

    -- //特殊選択肢 ⇒ 蹴り

    local result = HimeSenkyo(SenkyoData.EP04_4_ERU,"大袈裟に左拳を振りかぶったダリアさんの次の技は？")

    if result == false then
        NazenanoBokuhime("EP_BAD_12", "ERU_EP04_19")
        return
    end

    -- //SE：蹴りの音
PLAY_SE("SEc017.wav")
WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ A feint with the left punch, simultaneous kick. ]])

    MSG([[ I managed to read it, but my nose was grazed and a metallic taste spread sharply in my sinuses. ]])

    MSG([[ Seeing my grimace, Daria-san went into a punching stance. ]])

    MSG([[ This is my chance. An uncharacteristically impatient attack from her. ]])

    MSG([[ If I dodge this attack, I can finally go on the offensive. ]])

    MSG([[ She’s targeting the same unguarded vital point as before— ]])

    -- //特殊選択肢 ⇒ お腹

    local result = HimeSenkyo(SenkyoData.EP04_5_ERU,"ダリアさんが『姫摘み』で狙う場所は？")

    if result == false then
        NazenanoBokuhime("EP_BAD_12", "ERU_EP04_19")
        return
    end

    -- //CG：ステージ上のエリカ（接近するダリア・背景差分）

    -- //SE：突きの音
PLAY_SE("SEc039.wav")
WAIT(500)
    -- //SE：身を翻す音
PLAY_SE("SEc022.wav")
WAIT(400)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2280.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 (I won’t take the same move so many times...!) ]])

    MSG([[ Just in time—I slid my foot sideways to shift my stance and avoided the punch. ]])

    MSG([[ This "Princess Pinch" technique is quick but aims at a single point on the abdomen. Seeing it three times is enough to read it clearly. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0671.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Serious
 "Ugh...!" ]])

    MSG([[ Missing her all-out strike, Daria-san hurriedly tried to recover her stance. ]])

    MSG([[ If I’m going to counterattack, it has to be now. I decided to unleash the one attack that worked earlier once more— ]])

    -- //特殊選択肢 ⇒ 蹴り

    local result = HimeSenkyo(SenkyoData.EP04_6_ERU,"先ほど唯一成功した攻撃をもう一度――")

    if result == false then
        NazenanoBokuhime("EP_BAD_12", "ERU_EP04_19")
        return
    end

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2281.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Take that!!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0672.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "!?" ]])

    -- //SE：蹴りの音
PLAY_SE("SEc017.wav")
WAIT(500)
    -- //SE：身体の衝突音
PLAY_SE("SEa013.wav")
WAIT(300)

    MSG([[ My high roundhouse kick was blocked by Daria-san’s arm at the last moment. ]])

    MSG([[ But because her initial defense was delayed, her balance was greatly disrupted. She probably still can’t read foot techniques? ]])

    MSG([[ But on that day, Daria-san did say something like this. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("daria_plus0016.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "If you can see the opponent’s feet, that’s enough to read their next move." ]])
    -- //daria_plus0016.wav

PLAY_VOICE("erika_plus0012.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "If you can see the feet...?" ]])
    -- //erika_plus0012.wav

    MSG([[ —No way. I came to a terrifying possibility about why she can’t read my kicks. ]])

    MSG([[ There’s a big difference around my feet between that night and now. ]])

    MSG([[ That night I wore pants, but today I’m wearing a long skirt that covers both feet. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_plus0013.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (Could the reason Daria-san can’t read my kicks be because the skirt hides my legs?) ]])

    MSG([[ Surely a skirt, compared to pants, restricts the visual information of knee bends and subtle movements. ]])

    MSG([[ Moreover, in martial arts practice, it’s practically unheard of to spar with someone wearing a skirt. ]])

    MSG([[ To Daria-san, foot techniques from someone wearing a skirt may be an unknown threat. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s definitely worth testing. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_plus0014.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Seiya!" ]])

    -- //SE：蹴りの音
PLAY_SE("SEc017.wav")
WAIT(500)

    -- //CG：ステージ上のエリカ（対・ダリア・接近背景差分）

PLAY_VOICE("daria_plus0020.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "!?" ]])

    MSG([[ I suddenly launched a kick, and Daria-san jumped back in surprise. ]])

    MSG([[ The confidence vanished from her expression. Clearly, she didn’t anticipate and dodge but reacted after seeing it. ]])

    MSG([[ My guess turned into certainty. Daria-san really can’t react to my kicks. ]])

    -- //CG：ステージ上のエリカ（接近するダリア・接近背景差分）

    MSG([[ I closed the distance to avoid her gaining space and repeatedly struck with swift front kicks. ]])

    -- //SE：蹴りの音
PLAY_SE("SEc017.wav")
WAIT(200)
    -- //SE：蹴りの音
PLAY_SE("SEc017.wav")
WAIT(200)
    -- //SE：蹴りの音
PLAY_SE("SEc017.wav")
WAIT(200)

    MSG([[ A flurry of front kicks stabbing straight forward like spears. Meanwhile, Daria-san irritably kept up her defense. ]])

    MSG([[ But there’s a limit to defending. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("daria_plus0021.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Na—" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("daria_plus0022.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Don’t underestimate me...!" ]])

    -- //CI：010
    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG000aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(201,0,-165)
    SET_CUTIN_01_S(75, 300,true)

    MSG([[ Daria-san slipped through my front kicks and closed in. ]])

    RESET_CUTIN_01(230, 300)

    MSG([[ —Just as I thought she would. In the next moment, I twisted my waist and switched the front kick to a roundhouse— ]])

    MSG([[ The foot that was supposed to stab straight changed locus to a sweeping strike, connecting with Daria-san’s unguarded neck. ]])

    -- //SE： 打撃音
PLAY_SE("SEc025.wav")
WAIT(400)

PLAY_VOICE("daria_plus0023.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Gah...!" ]])

    MSG([[ For the first time, a valid strike landed. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s not over yet. Without pause, I slipped into Daria-san’s close range and spun my body with all my strength. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2282.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Ikusa-ryu Arresting Technique—" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)

    -- //effect：セピア加工
    -- //BG：公園
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG003aa")
    -- //BU：ロリマリカ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_CMA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ This was something Marika-neesan often showed me when I was little— ]])

    MSG([[ A throwing technique that minimizes injury, hurls the opponent forcefully, and breaks their will to fight. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)

    -- //CG：ステージ上のエリカ（決意のエリカのみアップ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVd001bb")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,800,-400)
    LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(LAYER_BG,120,120,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(LAYER_BG,1000,-500,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask025" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0673.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Marika—?" ]])

    -- //SE：身を翻す音
PLAY_SE("SEc022.wav")
WAIT(300)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2283.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "‘Fallen Leaves’!" ]])

    MSG([[ Using the momentum of the spin, I blew Daria-san away like a dry leaf. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask027",300,false)

    -- //SE：床に身体を叩きつけられる音
PLAY_SE("SEc018.wav")
WAIT(100)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG013ba")
    LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,500,500)
    LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(LAYER_BG,100,100,300,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0674.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Ugh..." ]])

    MSG([[ Daria-san crashed back-first into the wall with a dull thud. Then slowly, leaning against the wall, she collapsed. ]])

    -- //BG：姫神邸廊下
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013aa")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_2284.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "Hah— Hah—" ]])

    MSG([[ It’s not over yet. ]])

    MSG([[ The opponent is that Daria-san. She might still get up. ]])

    MSG([[ I steadied my breath and kept my fists raised. ]])

    MSG([[ Seeing me like that, Daria-san spoke in a weak voice. ]])

    -- //BU：ダリア（苦笑）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01fc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0675.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Wry smile,
 "Heh, rest assured. Unlike you, I’m not tough. I can’t even move a finger now." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0676.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Normal
 "You win... Erika-kun." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2285.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Serious
 "...Ossu! Thank you very much!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

STOP_BGM(2000)

    MSG([[ I accidentally greeted like I did back at the dojo, which was a little embarrassing. ]])

    MSG([[ But more than that, I was happy I could win a serious match against Daria-san. ]])

    MSG([[ Among all the martial artists I’ve met so far, she was the highest class user, and I beat her. ]])

    MSG([[ Now I can proudly say I’m not weak. I’m truly glad I believed I could get stronger and kept working hard. ]])

    MSG([[ Finally, I have become strong enough to protect someone— ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0677.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】Sadness
 "But it's all too late now." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2286.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】Surprised
 "...Huh?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Daria-san whispered quietly, clouding the hope that filled my heart. ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 1000,false)
    --WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP04_20")
end
